item.title: Dappest Branding
item.description: Dappest is a blockchain startup whose creator I worked with at Guardiome. They brought me onboard to create their branding, business cards, and create other graphical elements for the web app’s interface. Dappest is best described as “Yelp for DApps” in that it’s a community-driven ranking and commenting platform but focuses on DApps. Branding The early stages of branding were very exploratory as the identity of the company was still being formed.
